Texts.Chs: 机械人铁匠日夜辛勤工作，为他们的君主骇翼创造了一支军队。当然，这支军队无法战斗，甚至无法动，但是他们在某些角度看起来真的很棒。尽管如此，铁匠们最终还是造完了他们的假军队，并意识到是时候揭开它的面纱了。
Texts.Eng: The Glitch blacksmiths toiled day and night to create an army suitable for their lord Dreadwing. Of course, this army didn't fight, or even move, but they looked really great at certain angles. Eventually, though, the blacksmiths ran out of room for their false army, and realised it was time to unveil it.

Texts.Chs: 这本身就是一个问题。当然，军队不可能向城堡前进，也不可能向任何地方前进。机械人需要一个计划。这个计划连骇翼也不会质疑。最后，这个计划实现了，机械人们将举行一次游行。
Texts.Eng: This posed a problem in itself. Of course, the army was not capable of marching on the castle, or marching anywhere. A plan was needed. A plan that even Dreadwing would not question. And finally that plan came together; the Glitch would host a parade.
